org.redpin.android.ui.mapview
Class LocationMarker

java.lang.Object
  Button
      org.redpin.android.ui.mapview.LocationMarker

public class LocationMarker
extends Button

LocationMarker is the graphical representation of an Location on the MapView

Author:
Pascal Brogle (broglep@student.ethz.ch)
